message.body: Random I know, but if you have a fan of any kind you should bring it
sorry i dont! why do you need it?
Air conditioning is broken so we're trying to bring in the cool outside air
does sebastienne or irish lady know?
It's pretty comfortable in here now. And yes all those who would or could help know. We know the problem and are doing what we are able to get it to work
kk good. oh man this brigs back memories from a swelteringgroundswell show last year, luckily its cooler out
perhaps dumb question, did you turn it off, wait a few mins, and then back on? sometimes needs to reset
We did, we talked to Honeywell and to the installer - we know the problem, we have to keep this pad dry... Hard to explain but we know the problem
